title: You're Here for a Reason
description: Every person matters. Here, national-bestselling and beloved author Nancy Tillman shows readers how each of us fits into life's big picture, and how the world would be incomplete without you in it.You're here for a reason. If you think you're notI would just say that perhaps you forgot . . .a piece of the world that is precious and dearwould surely be missing if you weren't here.
author: Nancy Tillman
